body:
I've confirmed the problem still exists on gcc/trunk
```
lucky(~/devel/build) % env LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gccgo/lib64 GOPATH=/tmp/gopath /opt/gccgo/bin/go version
go version go1.4.2 gccgo (GCC) 5.0.0 20150324 (experimental) linux/amd64
lucky(~/devel/build) % env LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gccgo/lib64 GOPATH=/tmp/gopath /opt/gccgo/bin/gccgo -v
Using built-in specs.
COLLECT_GCC=/opt/gccgo/bin/gccgo
COLLECT_LTO_WRAPPER=/opt/gccgo/libexec/gcc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/5.0.0/lto-wrapper
Target: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
Configured with: ../gcc/trunk/configure --prefix=/opt/gccgo --enable-languages=c,c++,go --disable-bootstrap
Thread model: posix
gcc version 5.0.0 20150324 (experimental) (GCC) 
```
